title: cafter
author: cafter
created_time: October 12, 2023, 10:14:29 AMLast edit: January 18, 2024, 04:28:18 AM by cafter
content: I will serve as an Assistant Manager for Signature And Bounty Managers, delivering unwavering dedication and ensuring 100% accuracyWhat Are My Responsibilities?I will vigilantly Count eligible posts of campaign's participants that are eligible for payment, I will verify if any participants are in violation of the rules, and Inform participants who have been accepted in the campaign but have not yet wore the avatar, personal text and signature. I will Keep Records of participants who have been accepted in campaign and left the campaign. Â What is Rates for my service?For inquiries regarding rates and to discuss your budget, please reach out to me on Telegram at @brownricenet or through this link: https://t.me/brownricenet.

comments.author: xLays
comments.body: I have nothing against your current thread design I just wanted to made a new design for you. Since I have some free time, I made this for you, for free. https://talkimg.com/images/2023/10/12/RFv5N.png (Free templete from Canva)No worries just in case you don't want to use or like it. I wish you the best of luck with your services and hope you find a client quickly.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: xLays on October 12, 2023, 07:01:30 PMI have nothing against your current thread design I just wanted to made a new design for you. Since I have some free time, I made this for you, for free. Maybe a GIF rather than a static image would raise OP's interest?

Since I have some free time, I made this for you, for free. Maybe a GIF rather than a static image would raise OP's interest?I had the idea to create a logo for my name. The design I had in mind was something like C for Cafter with a spinning helicopter wing on C. Since I don't know how to design, I'll experiment with some program when I have some free time.The banner design should be simple and readable. Thanks for taking the effort xlays. You are a good designer. I seen you winning contests.
